alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Tooele County through 345 PM MDT... At 259 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Skull Valley, or 10 miles southwest of Grantsville, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Grantsville, Skull Valley and Tooele Army Depot. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 71 and 87. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys
